tool_description: Increase your web development productivity with this API that will instantly convert your Figma pages into fully fledged and functioning Elementor pages. Though further tweaking is required the amount of actions you save by not having to manually download the images, copy text, set colors and  fonts to image, etc... will make you love Vector2Web.
title: Vector2web

api_list.name: prod

required_parameters.name: figmaToken
required_parameters.description: The token generated by the Figma user granting access to their Figma files

required_parameters.name: figmaFileId
required_parameters.description: The id of the figma file visible in the url
